EmailTemplate.subject: A Relationship Manager Has Been Assigned To Your Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.OwnerFullName},
{!Account.Assigned_Relationship_Manager__c} has been assigned to your account {!Account.Name}.
You are still the account owner, the account will be transferred once a related open opportunity reaches stage 9.
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
